Fueling the
Next Generation
of Unicorns

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

Welcome to Epic Unicorn Ventures, where innovation meets
investment. We are one of the world’s leading venture capital
firms, known for our pivotal role in the success of unicorn startups.
Our mission is simple: we seek out and nurture the most promising
entrepreneurs, helping them grow into industry defining
companies.

” content_phone=”

entrepreneurs, helping them grow into industry defining companies.

Welcome to Epic Unicorn Ventures, where innovation meets
investment. We are one of the world’s leading venture capital
firms, known for our pivotal role in the success of unicorn startups.
Our mission is simple: we seek out and nurture the most promising
entrepreneurs, helping them grow into industry defining
companies.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#000000″ background_image=”https://epicunicorn.wpenginepowered.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Group-664.png” parallax=”on” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”130px||50px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”70px||40px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”50px|25px|0px|25px|false|true” scroll_scaling=”0|50|50|100|10%|100|100″ motion_trigger_start=”top” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”100%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”satoshi||on||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.92)” text_font_size=”30px” scroll_scaling=”0|57|57|100|20%|100|100%” text_font_size_tablet=”25px” text_font_size_phone=”20px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Vision

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

We believe in the power of transformative ideas. Whether it’s in cutting-edge tech.

” content_phone=”

We believe in the power of transformative ideas. Whether it’s in cutting-edge tech.

We believe in the power of transformative ideas. Whether it’s in cutting-edge tech.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

Revolutionary products, or breakthrough services, we know that today’s bold ideas are tomorrow’s unicorns. Epic Unicorn Ventures exists to empower the next wave of innovative companies, providing them with the capital, guidance, and strategic partnerships needed to scale to new heights.

About Our Founder

” content_phone=”

About Our Founder

” content_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”satoshi|–et_global_body_font_weight|||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.92)” text_font_size=”60px” text_line_height=”65px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||40px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||25px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||18px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||||false|true” custom_padding_phone=”||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”40px” text_font_size_phone=”30px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”55px” text_line_height_phone=”43px” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

About Our Founder

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=”Chris Obereder” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”20px” button_text_color=”#FFFFFF” button_bg_enable_image=”off” button_border_width=”1px” button_border_color=”rgba(133,131,131,0.7)” button_border_radius=”10px” button_font=”satoshi||||||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”||||true|true” custom_padding=”10px|27px|10px|27px|true|true” button_text_size_tablet=”18px” button_text_size_phone=”16px” button_text_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_css_main_element=” background: linear-gradient(45deg, #1C3F33, #3E2A69, #2C1C1C, #291E42) !important;” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”4″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”35px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”10px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.27.0″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

At the helm of Epic Unicorn Ventures is Christopher Obereder, a distinguished entrepreneur and venture capitalist whose influence reverberates across the global tech ecosystem. A Forbes 30 Under 30 honoree, Obereder’s expertise in growth hacking has driven over 350 million app installs worldwide and led to the successful exit of four companies.

” content_phone=”

At the helm of Epic Unicorn Ventures is Christopher Obereder, a distinguished entrepreneur and venture capitalist whose influence reverberates across the global tech ecosystem. A Forbes 30 Under 30 honoree, Obereder’s expertise in growth hacking has driven over 350 million app installs worldwide and led to the successful exit of four companies.

” content_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”satoshi||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.81)” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”32px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”18px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”32px” text_line_height_phone=”29px” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At the helm of Epic Unicorn Ventures is Christopher Obereder, a distinguished entrepreneur and venture capitalist whose influence reverberates across the global tech ecosystem. A Forbes 30 Under 30 honoree, Obereder’s expertise in growth hacking has driven over 350 million app installs worldwide and led to the successful exit of four companies.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

With more than 12 years of experience, his leadership has been instrumental in securing $360 million in funding for startups across diverse sectors. As the founder of the Bayern 3 Startup Challenge, a highly successful competition that reached over 4.5 million people daily, Obereder has proven his commitment to identifying and cultivating emerging talent. His €300,000 investment in promising startups through this initiative was just the beginning of his journey to find the next unicorn.

” content_phone=”

With more than 12 years of experience, his leadership has been instrumental in securing $360 million in funding for startups across diverse sectors. As the founder of the Bayern 3 Startup Challenge, a highly successful competition that reached over 4.5 million people daily, Obereder has proven his commitment to identifying and cultivating emerging talent. His €300,000 investment in promising startups through this initiative was just the beginning of his journey to find the next unicorn.

” content_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”satoshi||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.81)” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”32px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”18px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”32px” text_line_height_phone=”29px” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

With more than 12 years of experience, his leadership has been instrumental in securing $360 million in funding for startups across diverse sectors. As the founder of the Bayern 3 Startup Challenge, a highly successful competition that reached over 4.5 million people daily, Obereder has proven his commitment to identifying and cultivating emerging talent. His €300,000 investment in promising startups through this initiative was just the beginning of his journey to find the next unicorn.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

Obereder’s investment portfolio boasts over 100 angel investments, a testament to his ability to recognize and support disruptive
ventures from the ground up. As a speaker, he has inspired countless entrepreneurs and leaders, having presented at over 100
conferences annually, sharing his knowledge on innovation, growth, and scaling startups.

” content_phone=”

Obereder’s investment portfolio boasts over 100 angel investments, a testament to his ability to recognize and support disruptive
ventures from the ground up. As a speaker, he has inspired countless entrepreneurs and leaders, having presented at over 100
conferences annually, sharing his knowledge on innovation, growth, and scaling startups.

” content_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.27.2″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”satoshi||||||||” text_text_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.81)” text_font_size=”20px” text_line_height=”32px” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”18px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”32px” text_line_height_phone=”29px” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Obereder’s investment portfolio boasts over 100 angel investments, a testament to his ability to recognize and support disruptive ventures from the ground up. As a speaker, he has inspired countless entrepreneurs and leaders, having presented at over 100 conferences annually, sharing his knowledge on innovation, growth, and scaling startups.

Our Track Record

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text content_tablet=”

We don’t just invest we partner with startups, offering more than just capital. We leverage our extensive network, industry expertise, and strategic insights to ensure the success of every venture we back. To date, Epic Unicorn Ventures has been part of the success stories of various unicorns, and we are constantly on the lookout for the next industry leader
